sourceMeaningMnemonic: Wash your<radical>self</radical> with a <radical>big</radical> bar of soap if you're <kanji>stinking</kanji> everything up.
meaningInfo: Seriously. If you or someone else is stinking to high heaven, embrace a big bar of self care.
readingMnemonic: You're <kanji>stinking</kanji> up the room because you spent your day rolling in <ja><reading>草</reading></ja> (<ja>くさ</ja>). And based on this particular stench, I'd say an animal left something in that <ja>草</ja> too...
readingInfo: Imagine trying to use a big bar of soap on yourself to get the stinky <ja>草</ja> off. But it's not working... the <ja>草</ja> stink is SO STRONG!
